entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Snow ending this evening then clearing. Local blowing snow this evening. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 early this evening. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Monday 27 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 20.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind southwest 20 km/h. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 36 in the morning and minus 30 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Monday 27 March 2023
